description: Schema definition for the System Telemetry & Drift Manifest (STDM), used to validate computational and health status required for S6 resource check.

consumed_flops_estimate.description: Real-time estimate of execution complexity based on input.

time_limit_ms.description: Maximum clock time allowed for S7 completion.

MPAM_conformance.description: Metric derived from MPAM assessment regarding model integrity status (0.0 to 1.0).

baseline_deviation_epsilon.description: The current calculated system noise or tolerance threshold based on GTB data.

AgentReadiness.description: CRoT attested agent health status and versioning for active epoch.
